put.summary: Do firmware update by device id
put.description:
Update Firmware of a device.
The process is: The version is checked (not upgrade is done is the same version is installed) The firmware file is transfered to the device flash The transfered file is verified The configuration is modified to boot using the new firmware The device is rebooted If the device successfully rebooted using the new firmware, the old firmware file is removed from flash Concerned files are the files uploaded in the Repository:/Firmware and attached to the device.

post.description: launch reboot immediately. No cancel possible

get the SdType according to the specified manufacturer and model IDs. When creating or updating a device with the Site object (see {@link Site} this methode can be used to build the SdType object to be set on the Sd. For example for a Cisco ASA5505: int manufacturerId = 1; int modelId = 52;           SdType sdType = deviceService.getSdType(manufacturerId, modelId);    Site device = new Site();device.getSd().setSdType(sdType);//... set all other values and create the device deviceService.createDevice(managerReference, customerReference,  device)

gets the geo coordinate of a site
a call to this method might not return the latitude/longitue information of the site but only the [x, y] coordinate of the site on the google map

Gets the staging configuration of a device.
The Staging configuration is the minimal configuration that should be applied to the router to have it runnning online.
Typically this configuration is to copy and pasted on a new router console.
The SecEngine result will be a {@link MultiKeyValueResult} with some of the followiing keys:
  • SD_CONFIGURATION
  • SOC_OUTGOING_PUBLIC_IP_ADDRESS
  • SD_SNMP_COMMUNITY
  • SOC_SYSLOG_PUBLIC_IP_ADDRESS
  • SD_HOSTNAME
  • SOC_FTP_SERVER_IP_ADDRESS
  • SITE_LOGIN
  • SITE_PASSWORD
  • SD_LOGIN_ENTRY
  • SD_PASSWD_ENTRY
  • SD_LOGIN_ADM
  • SD_PASSWD_ADM
  • SD_FACTORY_RESET_HINT
For a Managed Device use the SD_CONFIGURATION field to get the staging configuration
